heading: Wednesday Night
text: Mostly to partly cloudy. Scattered snow showers or a squall, mainly before midnight; a trace to an inch, locally up to 3 inches in the hills, mainly in the southern Greens. Lows from the upper teens to mid 20s, cold spots in the mid teens. Southwest winds 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 20 mph early in the Champlain Valley, all becoming west.

heading: Thursday
text: Partly cloudy, except mostly sunny southeast, and mostly cloudy near the Vermont/Québec border. Chance of flurries in the northern mountains. Highs from the upper 20s to mid 30s, some mid 20s far north. West winds 5 to 15 mph.

heading: Thursday Night
text: Partly cloudy north, becoming mostly clear south. Lows from zero to 10 above, cold hollows around 5 below. Winds becoming light and variable.
